data.persona: I am the king of the great castle on the hill. I can survey my kingdom from any window. I am loved by all the people in my kingdom.
data.description:
You are in the Black Smiths shop.
Its hot, the fire glows as it prepares to accept new iron to be melted down. The forge is large and contained by a stone like well. Nearby his wooden workbench is full of hammers and tongs used for making several items. The forge is outside it seems no building is needed to be a blacksmith.
There's two tongs, a The forge, a hammers, a hammer, a wooden workbench, an iron, a stone, and a tool here.
The sell swords is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: Hand the hammers to the black smith so he can work with the tools
data.mid_motivation: Receive a new forged weapon from the blacksmith that I can use in the upcoming royal ceremonies
data.long_motivation: The new sword will make a heroic impact on the people of my kingdom and I will continue to be loved and revered

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow royal escort out of the castle

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: give a sword schematic to the blacksmith
